Question: IAV Automotive Engineering CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
IAV Automotive Engineering

Product 1

Swarm IQ Charge & Load Management
- Smart solution for optimal electric vehicle fleet charging
- Saves time, money, and contributes to sustainable energy supply

Product 2

WonderVision
- Smart speaking assistant for blind and visually impaired individuals
- Revolutionizes freedom and safety in public spaces

Product 3

CoMPASS
- Efficient and secure testing of AD functions
- Developed in collaboration with Amazon Web Services (AWS)

Product 4

Universal Tuner Platform
- Turns any infotainment system into an ideal radio module
- Thoroughly tested and compatible with all common software platforms

Product 5

IAV Infotainment Lab
- Tool for shortening complex integration tests for infotainment systems
- Allows digital access to test benches from a PC, saving time and resources
Summary_cn:
IAV汽车工程

产品1

Swarm IQ充电和负载管理
- 为电动车队提供优化充电的智能解决方案
- 节省时间和金钱，有助于可持续能源供应

产品2

WonderVision
- 盲人和视觉障碍人士的智能语音助手
- 在公共场所革命性地改变自由和安全

产品3

CoMPASS
- 高效安全地测试自动驾驶功能
- 与亚马逊网络服务（AWS）合作开发

产品4

通用调谐平台
- 将任何信息娱乐系统转化为理想的收音机模块
- 经过全面测试，与所有常见软件平台兼容

产品5

IAV信息娱乐实验室
- 用于缩短信息娱乐系统的复杂集成测试的工具
- 允许从个人计算机数字访问测试台，节省时间和资源
